content:
Yeah... I sent a message to my hosting company a few weeks ago about adding BD to their one-click and they've just announced that they have done it :slight_smile:

www.20i.com are a UK based web hosting company offering really good prices and an fantastic service - I'm a customer - and in no way affiliated with them.

WordPress, Website, and Reseller Web Hosting, VPS | 20i
Web hosting for WordPress, website hosting resellers, and virtual private servers (VPS). Fully-optimised SSD platforms with 100% UK support.

We have an issue for that: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/965

[ongoing] Backdrop in One-Click-Install collections 路 Issue #965 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
The typical Backdrop market would use those. Fantastico https://netenberg.com/fantastico.php Mojo https://www.mojomarketplace.com OpensourceCMS https://www.opensourcecms.com DockerHub https://hub.d...
